description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for one (1) Intermediate Project Administrator...
full_summary:
### Project Administrator Intermediate
#### Solicitation Number: W2282-24-AA002
#### Publication Date: March 20, 2024
#### Closing Date: April 10, 2024 2:00 PM EST
---

The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a solicitation for a one (1) Intermediate Project Administrator to manage a project in response to the Independent External Comprehensive Review (IECR) and the Chief of Defence Staff (CDS) / Deputy Minister (DM) Directive for Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) Reconstitution.

#### Project Details

* Contract Period: 1 year initial period with 2 option periods of 1 year each
* Project Scope: Administration of a project in response to the IECR and the CDS/DM Directive for CAF Reconstitution concerning retention

#### Tender Requirements

* This RFP is intended for one interim Project Administrator.
* The selected candidate will be responsible for managing a project under the direction of the Contracting Officer.
* The Project Administrator shall demonstrate proficiency in project management, administration, and coordination to deliver results and meet deliverables.
* The candidate must possess strong communication, analytical, and organizational skills.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on a combined Technical Merit and Price.

#### Security Requirements

* Must be able to obtain a security clearance (Privy Council Office Secret).

#### Eligibility

* The selected candidate must meet the basic qualifications, which include:
	+ A degree from a recognized university
	+ Four (4) years of experience in project management administration

#### Contact Information

For any questions or inquiries, please contact:
Olga Zelenskaia
Olga.Zelenskaia@forces.gc.ca
(613) 901-8743

#### Attachments and Additional Information
Refer to the attachments and additional information attached to this solicitation document.

---
